website_summaries.verdict: The Aorus KD25F is a compact 25-inch monitor with a blistering 240Hz refresh rate and a raft of gaming features, of interest mainly to esports hounds seeking peak refresh rates above all else.
pros: Settings can be controlled by mouse
Rated as G-Sync Compatible, and supports FreeSync
cons: Poor contrast when in gaming modes
Merely average color performance and input lag time

customer_reviews.title: Very premium feel to it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good all around feel about it, it is very well built, even if it looks a bit thin. Weight is very well balanced, the 165Hz is a game changer indeed, the only down-side to this, honestly, is the 2k resolution, as I was used to a 4k monitor before I bought this one. I do not regret buying it, it is a jack-of-all-trades monitor, which is exactly what i wanted, and the price is really competitive for a curved screen. Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Toderascu

customer_reviews.title: Gigabyte Aorus FI27Q-P - Moving from 60Hz 1080p to 165Hz 1440p AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: You wont ever go back to 1080p again once you have this amazing monitor. 109ppi too, the picture is crisp and sharp. You will wonder how did you put up with 1080p. Simply put this monitor is excellent, no regrets, in fact I want another one for dual set up. The On Screen Controls are easy to use, via the joystick in the middle. G-Sync compatible, make sure you update the monitor upon installation, latest is F03. The monitor is a quality build too, also comes in a sturdy cardboard box that will not damage your monitor while in transit. Enjoy screen tearing FREE gaming! BTW Doom looks and runs amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sean161

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Noob
customer_reviews.text: As my first proper gaming monitor I can say that it is leaps and bounds better than my past IPS budget monitor (as expected). So far so good, it was easy to assemble the 3 parts and it has been lovely to use both in normal use and whilst gaming. Only minor niggle is that the RGB lighting on the back does not glow very brightly meaning that unless you position it on an open back desk you cant really see the glow reflecting of the wall/ other surfaces. But does not effect the primary use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not for Nvidia cards.
customer_reviews.text: It's good monitor , great curve, and etc , really good colours , but its free sync! And its wrong advertised that its a g sync compatible, so its not, nothing really helps , g-sync off, or on, free sync on or off , you will see ghosting blurry and etc , was ok to play whitcher 3 and gta 5, worst eas csgo and mfs 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Jrs

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor would have liked an option that made it cheaper to go vesa mounts only as I bought two monitors and I've now got to hid to clearly expensive parts of the devices in a cupboard. Would have rather paid 20/50 quid less for the monitors without the stands. Other than that excellent screen insane refreshrate at 2.7k or 4k downscalled. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, don't buy it because of the RGB novelty however.
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming monitor and also works well enough for general office and browsing purposes. Crisp screen with no glare unless direct sunlight shines on it. RGB on the rear is completely redundant unless you turn the screen brightness all the way down and sit in the dark doing nothing....very gimmicky.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, had a dell dell s2417dg previously and the difference is amazing. The colour of an IPS panel compaired to the TN panel is amazing though the response times are not as fast and there is some slight ghosting if using speed mode with low fps. The colour more than makes up for this, also using balanced setting which got rid of the ghosting and no noticeable increase in the panels response times. I play games like cod and rocket league, i don't really play csgo so dunno if going from TN to IPS would make a difference in a game like that.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: New GIGABYTE G32QC Curved 3‎1.5"
customer_reviews.text: I just brought the GIGABYTE G32QC Curved 3‎1.5" and the display get darkness on the left side of the screen every a while and in order to make it bright again I have to turn off then on but this issue was resolved after contacting Gigabyte support which instructed to updated the firmware of the monitor. Now the monitor works great as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Monitor if a little expensive for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup , good build quality , looks smart and I was lucky enough not to have any dead pixels or anything like that! I would say the price is a little hefty I upgraded from an iiyama G-master and that costs around £270 this monitor is only slightly better paying for gsync compatibility . my iiyama G-master almost worked perfectly with g-sync on as well!
customer_reviews.author: Paul I

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor ive had
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing. I went from a 1080 60hz monitor to a 1440 165hz and I don't think id be able to go back to 60 again. Gameplay with this is amazing and the 27 inches and curved screen makes it even better for me. There are so many options I can adjust with the monitor through its own settings to assist with gameplay or change the style of viewing for movies etc.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have to say yes its a bit pricey but it is an absolute beauty, only had it 1 day and playing it on 165hz with a 2070 super is next level, beautiful colour, aesthetics and overall i would easy give this thing 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: son rates it highly!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased by my son during lockdown as he had built a gaming computer. He loves it, says quality of picture is superb, colours everything. I have asked him if there is anything he doesn't like about it, any faults, things that could be better & he said No!!
customer_reviews.author: neil cochrane

customer_reviews.title: decent but could do with being shipped with updated firmware
customer_reviews.text: decent monitor, although had an issue with backlighting, the online help was alright, took a few days to get back to me to tell me what to do, although the program for it didn’t acknowledge the firmware update, so had to search online to find the solution, turns out you need turn your pc language settings to us english, still took me a few attempts to make it work but finally when it did it was all sound and not had any issues since!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great graming monitor, don't forget to update your firmware otherwise you'll have some issues with the dimming in and out in dark images
customer_reviews.author: sherbmeister

customer_reviews.title: very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: love the monitor i thought it was very gd value for money would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor instead of two smaller ones and it was well worth it! The curve isn't as obvious at it looks when sat in front of it but it helps makes everything on the screen feel centered. Don't think I'll be able to go back to a 'standard' monitor after this!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Returned 2 time
customer_reviews.text: Leaks light through the screen has a poor build quality. The hdr is ok but the g-sync may have caused some problems
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Lovely monitor, amazing seller.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is great, maybe not the best at this price range but very very good. CCL computers though are just amazing. Very fast delivery and quick responses to my queries.
customer_reviews.author: Lauris

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and a very nice design. But the max hertz it allowing me too use it 144 hertz not 165hertz but besides that its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor with HDR capacity. Little expensive but very good!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Simister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Monitor arrived very well packaged and was very straight forward to set up. I have disabled the inbuilt speaker as I have a sound bar which sits perfectly beneath after adjusting the monitor height.. The picture is really nice and I'm using the out of the box settings. The menu is easy to access and navigate if you need to make any adjustments. The stand is very sturdy and all in all looks very smart. I would easily give this 10/10. My son was also very impressed and has now ordered one
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: I always thought the slight choppiness I got in some games was due to my RTX 2080 struggling. But once I set up G-Sync it's all as smooth as butter. Turns out it was the disparity between the refresh rates of the video card and my old monitor. G-Sync makes it feel like I've got a video card upgrade too. This monitor is fantastic. The curve is subtle and you quickly get used to it. The picture quality is amazing and I love the Anti-Glare coating. An absolute bargain.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is really amazing. High quality build. The picture quality seems really good aswel out of the box, haven't messed around with the settings yet as am happy with the default so far. The monitor on this stand is abit strange, if the desk is shaked just abit the monitor starts to shake however since my desk is really stable i dont have an issue with it, but some people might. The screen size was bigger than i expected. The price was decent for a 1440p 164hz monitor. Am really pleased with my monitor. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Nazmul Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor switching between a MacBook Pro and High-end PC, both look absolutely fantastic. On PC G-Sync works flawlessly (make sure you use Displayport if you want higher than 120Hz and G-Sync/Freesync support), playing games at ultra settings and 1440p looks absolutely fantastic, small amount of backlight bleed on full black but that's extremely hard for any monitor to combat. Also the Curve has really helped with eye-strain and headaches as I spend pretty much all day in front of my screen for work and then gaming and editing.
customer_reviews.author: Marchief

customer_reviews.title: Great curved display, bright colours
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, I love the curve. Personally I haven’t owned a curved display before but this is just amazing to view. I like the picture quality. There are multiple different settings in terms of which mode you want it on. The curve is nice and subtle. Not to curved. The colours are excellent. They are bright and deep. Has different inputs available. Overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ayman

customer_reviews.title: A very nice 1440p 165hz ISP monitor
customer_reviews.text: The colours are perfect, contrast is not. If you're watching in a dark room then the contast might be noticably not that great but it's always a trade. In return you get crisp, accurate picture. If you prefer really dark darks and really white whites over colour accuracy, consider a VA panel type monitor. I have noticed no input lag at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: sorry for the bad picture quality. the monitor is not that bad for a VA panel, the speakers are slightly louder than a pair of earbuds left on the table in front of you, it does work at 144hz, still can't figure out how to enable g-sync on it, overall it is pretty much bang for the buck... if you need 34 inches and 144hz, this is among the few options you've got at this price range, it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: pRomanian

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: So....lots of online reviews and lots of views out there, but it works well. Good FPS games so its great. Was scheptical as i play in 4K and 1080p and was not sure if all the talk of gama correction and resolution at 2k would be an issue. Its bright, fast and no ghosting at 165 FPS. Visualy it may not be IPS but you would not know it if no one told you!
customer_reviews.author: adelin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Using on my gaming PC and the 165Hz refresh rate is buttery smooth. Very nice quality picture, only let down by the awkward rear mounted joystick menu controller. There is a nice app that gives full control on screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for some premium features. Can look a little washed out until calibrated and gamma reports low value, so set to 4. Once adjusted, looks fine, and at this price is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic-Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Using with Nvidia card I get a bit of a flicker in a few games but mostly in menus and loading screens. Moving from TN panel, ghosting bothers me a bit but is not as bad as for some people. The only game where I can really see it a lot is fifa - the red player indicator ghosts and smudges very much so when moving on the pitch. Otherwise good value for money and ultrawide gaming is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: PatPat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic monitor, works as it should. I have no issues with this since I have owned it and a great step up from a 1080p 60hz monitor.
customer_reviews.author: johan rzymski

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, great picture, great HDR . Unfortunately after 3 months I had a nice blue line going from top to bottom of the screen due to dead pixels. Customer service has been good, loved the monitor so much i bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Phanoi

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to select a monitor for my gaming PC but this product will not disappoint, excellent visuals, adequate built in speakers and it has even reduced in price, a must have for GIGABYTE enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.author: stu39245

customer_reviews.title: Newbie to nice monitors, and I love it like a son
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen, it's huge and it looks beautiful. I can't say I have much knowledge of monitors, so there might be a lot I'm missing, but it's the first monitor I've bought that's 2k and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Took some getting used to but once setup I loved it amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good entry into 144hz+ 1440p monitors
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is great. The image quality is fantastic, aside from some smearing of dark colours when scrolling. The actual built quality is great too. Nice and sturdy, only moves when I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Dcorn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming experience. Very vibrant colours. A pleasure to use. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daya_9308

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is a real upgrade from a 1080p monitor. The 165hz, makes everything soo smooth when moving around. Brightness is perfect too. Has extra usb ports which is very handy. Really well made, and the stand is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: unkindlyoos

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant monitor
customer_reviews.text: Got this monitor for my xbox one s. The picture quality is amazing for movies and tv. Brilliant quality for playing games too such as forza, fortinte and cod warzone. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Oliver hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Young one love the monitor even if it smaller than previous one, this one gor much higher refresh sequence and seeper and sharper colours
customer_reviews.author: Nielka

customer_reviews.title: best monitor
customer_reviews.text: what can i say, i was single before i bought this monitor, then it was on sale, so i had to take the chance and buy it. Im still single but the monitor its pretty damn good.
customer_reviews.author: maxim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well worth the money. Amazon customer service is very poor so be aware...
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loves this... superb picture quality and refresh rate is fast.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Does the factory not have a QA department for these panels?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these, not through amazon, but through overclockers uk. On arrival I discovered that there was a set of dead pixels in the upper middle part of the screen. That's the first time this has happened to me in 20 years of buying monitors. Fine, no problem. Arranged a replacement only to have the second screen exhibit a different set of dead pixels and a horizontal black bar when displaying HDR content. This is a £450 product that's 0/2. TLDR; Give your money to people who won't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs & Mrs Law-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Check your model numbers.
customer_reviews.text: The same 31.5 inch g32qc with a lenovo badge is £90 cheaper here on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive monitor for the money. I was initially looking for an IPS monitor but after reading reviews i decided to give this a try. Great contrast and colours. My Gigabyte 2080 super matches the styling too.
customer_reviews.author: jsalt789

product_meta.title: Gigabyte AORUS KD25F 24.5 Inch TN FHD (1920 x 1080) 240 Hz FreeSync/G-Sync Compatible Gaming Monitor
product_meta.description:
Style Name:AORUS KD25F (24.5 Inch)AORUS KD25F Tactical Gaming monitor features a 24.5” FHD 1920x1080 resolution in a 16:9 aspect ratio. KD25F is equipped with a native 240hz refresh rate panel, which ensures an extremely fluid gameplay and fast image buildup. It supports AMD FreeSync™ Premium Technology which puts an end to choppy gameplay and broken frames and creates a fluid and artifact-free performance at any framerate. Gamers will experience fluid gaming 
visuals, especially in first-person 
shooters and racing games, where 
the difference is particularly obvious.
feature_bullets: Tn panel with 8-bit colour and 0.5ms response time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
